articles.author: Corbin Hiar
articles.title: Researchers quietly planned a test to dim sunlight. They wanted to ‘avoid scaring’ the public. - Politico
articles.description: Hundreds of documents show how researchers failed to notify officials in California about a test of technology to block the sun’s rays — while they planned a much huger sequel.
articles.content: They also offer a rare glimpse into the vast scope of research aimed at finding ways to counter the Earths warming, work that has often occurred outside public view. Such research is drawing increase… [+21952 chars]
